name: Department of Agriculture
description: Welcome to the official Webpage of the Department of Agriculture, Ministry of Agriculture Development (MOAD), Nepal. Agriculture is the major sector of Nepalese economy. It provides employment opportunities to 66 percent of the total population and contributes about 34.7 percent in the GDP.( Economic Survey: 069/70) Therefore, the development of agriculture sector is key for the development of national economy. The DOA bears overall responsibility for the agricultural growth and development of agriculture sector.Agriculture sector still has got prime role to play in Nepalese economy. This sector has offered employment to 66 per cent of the economically active population, 34.7 percent contribution is made to the GDP with 13 percent of the total foreign trade of the country. Keeping in view of the contribution, the agriculture sector was given priority for its development from the onset of the periodic plans till the Eighth Five Year Plan.
